mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_event (event_id, module_id, time, temp, smoke, gyro, fire, issue) VALUES (null, #{module_id}, now(), #{temp}, #{smoke}, #{gyro}, #{fire}, #{issue});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_event WHERE module_id = "0" ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT ${value};
SELECT event_id, module_id, time, temp, smoke, 80 - (gyro/13) as 'gyro', fire, issue FROM tb_event WHERE module_id = #{value} ORDER BY event_id DESC LIMIT 12
SELECT * FROM tb_event order by time DESC limit ${value};
